overview: Contributed to AI/ML research and development for AndGo Inc.'s R&D team, focusing on evaluating and prototyping advanced models for potential integration. Collaborated with international team members across multiple time zones to support AI capability deployment.

responsibilities.title: Research & Evaluation
responsibilities.description: Reviewed and assessed contemporary AI/ML models from academic and open-source sources. Considered feasibility and readiness for integration into internal systems.

responsibilities.title: Rapid Prototyping
responsibilities.description: Developed proof-of-concept implementations to explore model capabilities in practical scenarios. Iterated on approaches to meet project requirements.

responsibilities.title: Cross-Team Collaboration
responsibilities.description: Worked with engineering and product teams to align research with organizational goals. Communicated findings to stakeholders with varying technical backgrounds.

responsibilities.title: Documentation & Knowledge Transfer
responsibilities.description: Documented evaluation processes and implementation decisions to support smooth handoffs to engineering teams.

achievements.description: Contributed to the evaluation and prototyping of multiple AI models for potential integration.
Supported the development of internal processes to streamline research and engineering collaboration.
Effectively coordinated with team members across different locations and time zones.

professionalGrowth.title: International Exposure
professionalGrowth.description: Gained experience collaborating with a diverse, international team and adapting to different communication styles and workflows.

professionalGrowth.title: Research-to-Production Pipeline
professionalGrowth.description: Learned to bridge the gap between academic research and practical engineering, focusing on real-world applicability and integration.

professionalGrowth.title: Rapid Learning & Adaptation
professionalGrowth.description: Adapted quickly to new concepts, frameworks, and methodologies in a fast-paced research environment.

professionalGrowth.title: Career Impact
professionalGrowth.description: This experience reinforced my interest in AI/ML engineering and provided valuable perspective on evaluating research for real-world use.

professionalGrowth.title: Life Impact
professionalGrowth.description: Click to read more about my time in Japan & Korea.
